title: 04/01/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 04/01/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin off, Doug Gottlieb fills in and reacts to some BREAKING NEWS: Legendary head coach for North Carolina Roy Williams has retired. He discusses the reports about top quarterback prospect Justin Fields and why he might be falling down draft boards. Plus, new Marquette head coach Shaka Smart joins the show to talk about his decision to leave Texas. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
